solution_line_template: The total cost of the entrees is {num_entrees} * ${cost_per_entree} = $<<{num_entrees}*{cost_per_entree}={total_entree_cost}>>{total_entree_cost}.
The total cost of the dinner is ${total_entree_cost} + ${appetizer_cost} = $<<{total_entree_cost}+{appetizer_cost}={total_dinner_cost_before_tip}>>{total_dinner_cost_before_tip}.
The total cost with tip is ${total_dinner_cost_before_tip} + ${tip_amount} = $<<{total_dinner_cost_before_tip}+{tip_amount}={final_total_cost}>>{final_total_cost}
